summary: Diff adds a full app shell with routing to many tool pages, a reusable ToolStudio workspace (Input/Preview/Output) with local canvas-based processing and export, Internet Identity-based authentication gating for projects, and backend Motoko persistence for projects (plus user profiles/access control). Some requested UI/asset requirements canâ€™t be confirmed from the provided diff summary due to omitted/truncated files.

missing_requirements.requirement: For every tool page, implement dedicated presets (>=5 unique per tool) and an Advanced settings section (>=8 configurable fields) plus reset-to-default.
missing_requirements.reason: ToolConfigPanel supports presets and advanced settings generically, but the diff summary does not include the per-tool configuration definitions (presets/settings counts per tool) needed to verify the >=5 presets and >=8 fields for every listed tool.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend persistence for user projects and tool runs with list, view details, rename, and delete actions; restoring preset + configuration values when opening a saved run.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend code is truncated before showing full implementations for getProject/update/rename/delete flows, and the frontend pages that would demonstrate restore-on-open (MyProjectsPage/ProjectDetailsPage/tool page restore) are omitted from the diff summary, so the required end-to-end behaviors cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Dashboard page that links to every requested tool.
missing_requirements.reason: Routes are defined, but the dashboard implementation is not shown (omitted/truncated), so it cannot be verified that the dashboard contains links to every tool.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include static brand assets (logo, dashboard hero/background, tool category icon set) under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the logo path is referenced in AppShell; the diff summary does not show the actual asset files under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor any usage of the required hero background or the required tool icon set image.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management and a forced profile setup modal (name entry) after authentication.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on tool studio + project persistence; it does not request user profile creation/management UX.

hallucinated_features.description: Access control initialization via a secret URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and authorization mixin integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention admin-token URL parameters or an access-control initialization scheme beyond using Internet Identity if auth is used.
